languages.text: Удивленные пилоты послушно пробудили дух резвого шаттла, и разведывательная экспедиция покинула замерзший мир. Отбывая, разведчики перешептывались, что теперь у Ангела Императора нет способа вернуться на корабль, если Лорд-капитан не соизволит забрать его с планеты.

The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.
languages.original_text: Удивленные пилоты послушно пробудили дух резвого шаттла, и разведывательная экспедиция покинула замерзший мир. Отбывая, разведчики перешептывались, что теперь у Ангела Императора нет способа вернуться на корабль, если Лорд-капитан не соизволит забрать его с планеты.

traits.locale_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

languages.text: 飞行员一脸惊讶，但还是顺从地发动了运转良好的穿梭机，离开了这个冰封的世界。当那颗行星渐渐消失在远方的时候，侦察兵们开始窃窃私语——如今，除非领主舰长愿意屈尊纡贵，回去搭救帝皇的天使，否则那位太空野狼战士已经不可能再回到飞船上了。
languages.original_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

traits.locale_text: 飞行员一脸惊讶，但还是顺从地发动了运转良好的穿梭机，离开了这个冰封的世界。当那颗行星渐渐消失在远方的时候，侦察兵们开始窃窃私语——如今，除非领主舰长愿意屈尊纡贵，回去搭救帝皇的天使，否则那位太空野狼战士已经不可能再回到飞船上了。

languages.text: パイロットは驚きつつも命令に従い、元気なシャトルの精霊を起こす。偵察調査部隊は氷の星を出発する。惑星が眼下へと遠ざかるにつれ、偵察部隊は内輪でひそひそ話をする。これで皇帝の天使がこのシップに戻る術はない。ロード・キャプテンに救い出してもらわぬ限りは、と。
languages.original_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

traits.locale_text: パイロットは驚きつつも命令に従い、元気なシャトルの精霊を起こす。偵察調査部隊は氷の星を出発する。惑星が眼下へと遠ざかるにつれ、偵察部隊は内輪でひそひそ話をする。これで皇帝の天使がこのシップに戻る術はない。ロード・キャプテンに救い出してもらわぬ限りは、と。

languages.text: Los pilotos sorprendidos arrancan obedientemente el espíritu de la bulliciosa lanzadera y la expedición de reconocimiento abandona el mundo helado. Según van dejando atrás el planeta, los exploradores susurran entre ellos: ahora es imposible que el ángel del Emperador regrese a la nave, a menos que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se digne a rescatarlo.
languages.original_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

traits.locale_text: Los pilotos sorprendidos arrancan obedientemente el espíritu de la bulliciosa lanzadera y la expedición de reconocimiento abandona el mundo helado. Según van dejando atrás el planeta, los exploradores susurran entre ellos: ahora es imposible que el ángel del Emperador regrese a la nave, a menos que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se digne a rescatarlo.

languages.text: Surpris, les pilotes réveillent docilement l'esprit de la navette et l'expédition de reconnaissance quitte le monde gelé. Alors qu'ils s'éloignent de la planète, les éclaireurs murmurent entre eux que l'ange de l'Empereur n'a désormais plus aucun moyen de revenir à bord du vaisseau, sauf si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} daigne le secourir.
languages.original_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

traits.locale_text: Surpris, les pilotes réveillent docilement l'esprit de la navette et l'expédition de reconnaissance quitte le monde gelé. Alors qu'ils s'éloignent de la planète, les éclaireurs murmurent entre eux que l'ange de l'Empereur n'a désormais plus aucun moyen de revenir à bord du vaisseau, sauf si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} daigne le secourir.

languages.text: Die überraschten Piloten wecken gehorsam den Geist des Shuttles, und die Aufklärungsmission verlässt die eisige Welt. Als der Planet in der Distanz verschwindet, flüstern die Späher untereinander, dass der Engel des Imperator jetzt nur noch zum Schiff zurückkehren kann, wenn der Lord Captain ihn gezielt abholt.
languages.original_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

traits.locale_text: Die überraschten Piloten wecken gehorsam den Geist des Shuttles, und die Aufklärungsmission verlässt die eisige Welt. Als der Planet in der Distanz verschwindet, flüstern die Späher untereinander, dass der Engel des Imperator jetzt nur noch zum Schiff zurückkehren kann, wenn der Lord Captain ihn gezielt abholt.

languages.text: Şaşkın pilotların itaatle canlı mekiği kaldırması ile keşif seferi, donuk dünyadan ayrılıyor. Gezegen aşağıda gözlerden uzaklaşırken keşif erleri kendi aralarında fısıldaşıyor: Artık Lord Kaptan onu kurtarmak istemediği sürece İmparator'un Meleği'nin gemiye dönmesine imkân yok.
languages.original_text: The surprised pilots obediently rouse the spirit of the lively shuttle and the reconnaissance expedition leaves the frozen world. As the planet recedes into the distance below, the scouts whisper among themselves: now there is no way for the Angel of the Emperor to return to the ship unless the Lord Captain deigns to extricate him.

traits.locale_text: Şaşkın pilotlar, itaatle canlı mekiği kaldırdı ve keşif turu, donuk dünyadan ayrıldı. Gezegen aşağıda gözlerden uzaklaşırken keşif erleri kendi aralarında fısıldaştı: Artık Lord Kaptan onu kurtarmak istemediği sürece İmparator'un Meleği'nin gemiye dönmesine imkân yoktu.
